title: How to Make a Giant Cookie

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius).
Grease a 14 inch round pizza pan.
Cream the butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, and vanilla until light and fluffy.
Crack in the eggs and blend until fully combined.
Stir in the dry ingredients.
steps.description: Pour in the flour, baking soda, and salt. Blend slowly until properly combined.

steps.headline: Fold in the chocolate chips and mix well.
Flatten and spread the cookie dough on the pizza pan.
Bake the cookie in the oven for about 20-25 minutes.
Allow the cookie to cool for about 10 minutes.
Serve.
steps.description: Slice the cookie into pieces. Top with vanilla ice cream, if desired. Enjoy!

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (180 degrees Celsius).
Grease a cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray.
Cream the butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla until light and fluffy.
Fold in the cream of tarter, flour, baking soda, salt and sprinkles.
steps.description: Blend until properly combined, but do not over-mix.

steps.headline: Flatten and spread the cookie dough on the cookie sheet.
Bake the cookie in the oven for about 14-16 minutes.
Allow the cookie to cool for about 10 minutes.
Serve.
steps.description: Slice the cookie into pieces. Top with whipped cream, if desired. Enjoy!

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (180 degrees Celsius).
Grease a cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray.
Cream the butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla until light and fluffy.
Add the peanut butter and stir in the dry ingredients.
steps.description: Pour in the flour, baking soda, and salt. Blend slowly until properly combined.

steps.headline: Fold in the chocolate chips and Reese's Pieces.
Flatten and spread the cookie dough on the cookie sheet.
Bake the cookie in the oven for about 17-19 minutes.
Allow the cookie to cool for about 10 minutes.
Serve.
steps.description: Slice the cookie into pieces. Top with vanilla ice cream, if desired. Enjoy!

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius).
Grease a cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray.
Combine the dry ingredients together.
steps.description: Mix the flour, oats, baking soda, baking powder, and both sugars together.

steps.headline: Cream the butter, vanilla, and egg.
steps.description: Blend with an electric mixer until properly combined.

steps.headline: Add the creamed mixture into the dry ingredients.
Flatten and spread the cookie dough on the cookie sheet.
Bake the cookie in the oven for about 12-15 minutes.
Allow the cookie to cool for about 10 minutes.
Serve.
steps.description: Slice the cookie into pieces. Top with vanilla ice cream or raisins, if desired. Enjoy!

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (180 degrees Celsius).
Grease a cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray.
Stir the flax seed and water together in a small bowl.
steps.description: Allow it to sit until the gel forms, taking about 5 minutes.

steps.headline: Grind the oats, coconut flour, baking soda, and salt.
steps.description: Grind them together in a blender until well-combined.

steps.headline: In a medium-sized bowl, blend the seed or nut butter with the coconut sugar and coconut oil.
steps.description: Mix on low speed using an electric mixer.

steps.headline: Stir in the flax mixture and vanilla into the blended coconut mixture.
Fold in the dry ingredients mixture and add the chocolate chips.
Flatten and spread the cookie dough on the cookie sheet.
Bake the cookie in the oven for about 12-15 minutes.
Allow the cookie to cool for about 10 minutes.
Serve.
steps.description: Slice the cookie into pieces. Top with extra chocolate chips, if desired. Enjoy!

text: Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius).  Grease a 14 inch round pizza pan.  Cream the butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, and vanilla until light and fluffy. Beat for about 2 minutes. Crack in the eggs and blend until fully combined.  Stir in the dry ingredients. Pour in the flour, baking soda, and salt. Blend slowly until properly combined. Fold in the chocolate chips and mix well.  Flatten and spread the cookie dough on the pizza pan.  Bake the cookie in the oven for about 20-25 minutes.  Allow the cookie to cool for about 10 minutes.  Serve. Slice the cookie into pieces. Top with vanilla ice cream, if desired. Enjoy! Giant Sugar Cookie Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (180 degrees Celsius).  Grease a cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray.  Cream the butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla until light and fluffy. Beat for about 2 minutes. Fold in the cream of tarter, flour, baking soda, salt and sprinkles. Blend until properly combined, but do not over-mix. Flatten and spread the cookie dough on the cookie sheet.  Bake the cookie in the oven for about 14-16 minutes.  Allow the cookie to cool for about 10 minutes.  Serve. Slice the cookie into pieces. Top with whipped cream, if desired. Enjoy! Giant Peanut Butter Cookie Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (180 degrees Celsius).  Grease a cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray.  Cream the butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla until light and fluffy. Beat for about 2 minutes. Add the peanut butter and stir in the dry ingredients. Pour in the flour, baking soda, and salt. Blend slowly until properly combined. Fold in the chocolate chips and Reese's Pieces.  Flatten and spread the cookie dough on the cookie sheet.  Bake the cookie in the oven for about 17-19 minutes.  Allow the cookie to cool for about 10 minutes.  Serve. Slice the cookie into pieces. Top with vanilla ice cream, if desired. Enjoy! Giant Oatmeal Cookie Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius).  Grease a cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray.  Combine the dry ingredients together. Mix the flour, oats, baking soda, baking powder, and both sugars together. Cream the butter, vanilla, and egg. Blend with an electric mixer until properly combined. Add the creamed mixture into the dry ingredients. Blend well until Incorporated together. Flatten and spread the cookie dough on the cookie sheet.  Bake the cookie in the oven for about 12-15 minutes.  Allow the cookie to cool for about 10 minutes.  Serve. Slice the cookie into pieces. Top with vanilla ice cream or raisins, if desired. Enjoy! Giant Vegan Cookie Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (180 degrees Celsius).  Grease a cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray.  Stir the flax seed and water together in a small bowl. Allow it to sit until the gel forms, taking about 5 minutes. Grind the oats, coconut flour, baking soda, and salt. Grind them together in a blender until well-combined. In a medium-sized bowl, blend the seed or nut butter with the coconut sugar and coconut oil. Mix on low speed using an electric mixer. Stir in the flax mixture and vanilla into the blended coconut mixture. Whisk until properly combined. Fold in the dry ingredients mixture and add the chocolate chips. Blend well until fully mixed. Flatten and spread the cookie dough on the cookie sheet.  Bake the cookie in the oven for about 12-15 minutes.  Allow the cookie to cool for about 10 minutes.  Serve. Slice the cookie into pieces. Top with extra chocolate chips, if desired. Enjoy!
